main_definition: Everyday refers to something that is common, ordinary or part of daily life.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to daily routine or habits
meanings_and_examples.example: Maintaining an everyday exercise regimen for better health.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Everyday use, non-specialized items or terms
meanings_and_examples.example: Using common household appliances such as a toaster and microwave in everyday life.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Ordinary occurrences or events that happen regularly
meanings_and_examples.example: The everyday hustle of going to work, running errands, and taking care of household chores.
